channel.title: Deamon sheild (first model from scratch)
channel.description:
I am going to show you my first models but before you go to see the pictures cause i know everybody just wants to see the model read this this is my first model from scratch i know i didnt put much detail in it but i tried i am not the creative type i am trying to be creative think of things but this is what i did with no outline or anything so please no flaming just tell me what needs improving please. Everyone starts somewhere, I love criticism it helps me improve but not flaming is stupid everyone starts somewhere even with recolors. You start with basics and move on so stop fricking flaming topics where they made terrible models or made their models ugly colors or even recolored. The people who do that probably are just begining with metasquoia. I still suck at modeling but in school im taking a class STEM(Science Technology Engineering Mathmatics.) and we are modeling with professional software AUTODESK Invention and this will help me a ton with metasquoia.
Draft/Front (crapy i know):
[IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss147/lukenuke75/picv.png[/img]
simple wall:
[IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss147/lukenuke75/wall.png[/img]
i made the simple wall because people encouraged me to make better ones so i tried i think its cool no download yet tho and when i go into datmaker and view it it is just white why w hen i have texture i have the color set to white for the actual color idk how to get texture onto that but if this is normal please tell me
boomerang:
[IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss147/lukenuke75/back.png[/img] [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss147/lukenuke75/front.png[/img] [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss147/lukenuke75/side-1.png[/img]
Mask:
[IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss147/lukenuke75/mask.png[/img]
Bandos Platebody: This is still in progress i am tring to figure out how to make it curved
Front view:
[IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss147/lukenuke75/outline.png[/img]
if you like it i have a download link or if you want to edit it thats fine with me umm well hope you liked it hope i get good reviews not terriable ones but here is download links: (they are .dat files already!)
(mask)Rapidshare: http://rapidshare.de/files/48478917/mask.png.html (wall)Rapidshare: http://rapidshare.de/files/48468403/Granitewallb.dat.gz.html (Sheild)Rapidshare: http://rapidshare.de/files/48468213/Demonsheildb.dat.gz.html (boomerang)Rapidshare: http://rapidshare.de/files/48468509/boomerangb.dat.gz.html

item.title: Deamon sheild (first model from scratch)
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

[quote=“Explisionist, post:14, topic:306393”][quote author=lukenuke75 link=topic=402547.msg2986684#msg2986684 date=1255032346]

you cant do any better

actually i can

No one care’s, don’t laugh at peoples work, because your’s is probably just as bad.

First off i rate it a 2/10, read some tutorials, and practice before releasing.

not everyone can learn by reading i cant i have to do hands on with myself no books or tuts never could
[/quote]

Ic, well practice makes perfect… But just keep practicing til you make something your proud of.[/quote]

dang your actually made me feel better… thanks

Read full topic
